# gal-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                           | Type                                                     | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `colorVariant` | `color-variant` | Color theme of the button             | `"accent" \| "light-accent" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`      | If true, button is disabled           | `boolean`                                                | `false`     |
| `fullWidth`    | `full-width`    | If true, button takes full width      | `boolean`                                                | `false`     |
| `iconOnly`     | `icon-only`     | If true, only shows icon without text | `boolean`                                                | `false`     |
| `loading`      | `loading`       | If true, shows loading spinner        | `boolean`                                                | `false`     |
| `size`         | `size`          | Size of the button                    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                         | `'medium'`  |
| `type`         | `type`          | HTML button type                      | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                        | `'button'`  |
| `variant`      | `variant`       | Style variant of the button           | `"filled" \| "outlined" \| "text"`                       | `'filled'`  |
